def count_non_overlapping_substrings(s: str, t: str) -> int:
    (n, m) = (len(s), len(t))
    t = '$'.join((t, s))
    p = [0]
    k = 1
    for i in range(1, n + m + 1):
        while k and t[k] != t[i]:
            k = p[k - 1]
        if t[k] == t[i]:
            k += 1
        p.append(k)
    ans = [0] * n
    sums = [0] * (n + 1)
    curs = 0
    was = False
    j = 0
    MOD = 1000000007
    for i in range(n):
        if p[i + m + 1] == m:
            if not was:
                was = True
                curs = 1
            while j <= i - m:
                curs = (curs + sums[j] + 1) % MOD
                j += 1
        ans[i] = curs
        sums[i] = (sums[i - 1] + ans[i]) % MOD
    return sum(ans) % MOD
